resources.string: Once more time, will be exit
Unable to create a picture save directory
The height and width of the object of these two elements, it is best to fill in at least one of them, of course, you can also ignore the operation, while calculating the distance to fill up.
Tip: the ratio of the industry standard length to width is fixed to 4/3, if your CCD/CMOS is a photosensitive element is square (1/1) or other proportion of words, can make changes
Tip: the size of the sensor is actually a long and wide ratio of the diagonal length of the rectangular 4:3 (units of inches), common 1/2.0, 1/1.8, 1/2.3
Calculate the length and width of the size (CM) as:
Tip: usually the length of a pixel point is the same as the width of a unit of UM.
For a example: Meizu MX4 phone configuration of the camera, the choice is the SONY imx220 sensor, its size is 1/2.3 inches, pixel length of 1.2um width of 1.2um, the factor value set to 2.0
Tip: adjust the value, avoid the hardware equipment factors, caused by the calculation of differences, the default is 1.0
Sensor size can not be empty, and the value can not be zero
The length and width of the pixel of the sensor can not be empty, and the value can not be zero.
Factor coefficients should not be zero, you can default to 1.0 and then adjust the adjustment
Among the two items that are being hit, one must choose one of them, and the contents of it can not be empty. For specific parameter values, you can query configuration information.
Do not prompt me about this again.
The parameters you have entered are not complete, so it will not be saved automatically.
I know, wait a moment and then improve the information
